attributes.action: Stop the trials and the introduction of the "NoOutsiders" teachings in schools to children aged 4 to 11 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Trials are taking place under the heading of "No Outsiders". These trials are  bringing to the attention of our children, the lifestyles of Lesbians and Homosexuals.
Our cildren will find out in there own time about alternatives to a male/female relationship. We do not want them involved or made aware of such matters between the ages of 4years and 11 years. Stop this now and let children be children not conditioned zombies of the government.
